core.documents_data_class module

Data classes to be consumed by retriever component. (1) It acts as interface to the database, local or cloud. (2) It works in tandem with the vectorizer component.

class core.documents_data_class.Chunk(vector: List[float], text: str, order: int | None = None, doc_id: str | UUID | None = None, id: str | UUID | None = None, estimated_num_tokens: int | None = None, meta_data: Dict | None = None)[source]
